EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Unsuccessful enrollment in {!Incentive_Program_Enrollment__c.Incentive_Program__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Incentive_Program_Enrollment__c.Requester__c} ,
Thank you for your interest in the {!Incentive_Program_Enrollment__c.Incentive_Program__c}.
The enrollment period has passed therefore; we are unable to grant eligibility for this Incentive.
Regards,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
